sn22.133:1.4: “Reverend Koṭṭhita, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
sn22.133:1.6: And how is an ignorant person defined?”
sn22.133:2.1: “Reverend, an uneducated ordinary person doesn’t truly understand the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form,
sn22.133:2.7: And this is how an ignorant person is defined.”
sn22.133:3.1: When he said this, Venerable Sāriputta said to him:
sn22.133:3.2: “Reverend Koṭṭhita, they speak of this thing called ‘knowledge’.
sn22.133:3.4: And how is a knowledgeable person defined?”
sn22.133:4.1: “Reverend, an educated noble disciple truly understands the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form,
sn22.133:4.7: And this is how a knowledgeable person is defined.”
